title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating the Connected Future: EDA for the unpredictable (IND308)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速互联未来：应对不可预测性的事件驱动架构 (IND308)
abstract: Join us to learn how BMW RemoteServices transformed their backend to a fully Serverless Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) to meet increased scaling demands and improve innovation velocity whilst maximizing cost efficiency. We share insights into the architecture supporting BMW's next generation of vehicles, Neue Klasse, and explore strategies for breaking down monolithic applications into flexible, event-driven microservices. This architecture, featuring various AWS Serverless services, demonstrates how to orchestrate loosely coupled services into discrete blocks of business logic.
abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解BMW RemoteServices如何将其后端转型为完全无服务器的事件驱动架构(EDA)，以满足不断增长的扩展需求，提高创新速度，同时最大化成本效率。我们将分享支持BMW下一代车型Neue Klasse的架构见解，并探讨将单体应用程序分解为灵活的事件驱动微服务的策略。该架构采用了多种AWS无服务器服务，展示了如何将松耦合服务编排为离散的业务逻辑模块。
